Detailed Description

The ATC handler AtcHandler provides an interface for the application to interact on AT requests from protocol stack.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN AtcHandler::CommitPbInformation (  const MePhonebookDescription &  description  )  [inline]
 

The method CommitPbInformation() sends the description of phonebooks to the ATC, so that it knows which phonebooks are available within the MMI

BOOLEAN AtcHandler::ConfirmPbAlphaTagRequest (  const WString &  alphatag,
const PhoneNumber &  phno,
BOOLEAN  apoxilookup = FALSE
)  [inline]
 

The method ConfirmPbAlphaTagRequest() sends the alphatag back to the AT, apoxilookup controls if a lookup shall be done also by APOXI in case the alphatag is not empty, the phno must be retrieved from the PbAlphaTagRequestMsg

BOOLEAN AtcHandler::ConfirmPbEntryRequest (  BOOLEAN  capable,
MePhoneBookType  type,
INT  recordnumber,
const WString &  alphaidentifier,
const PhoneNumber &  phno
)  [inline]
 

The method ConfirmPbEntryRequest() sends a record entry of a certain phonebook back to the AT. It has to be called by the MMI if it has previously received the Message PbEntryRequestMsg

BOOLEAN AtcHandler::ConfirmPbSizeRequest (  BOOLEAN  capable,
MePhoneBookType  type,
INT  usedrecords,
INT  totalrecords = 0
)  [inline]
 

The method ConfirmPbSizeRequest() sends the size of a certain phonebook back to the AT. It has to be called by the MMI if it has previously received the Message PbSizeRequestMsg

HandlerId AtcHandler::GetHandlerId (   )  const [virtual]
 

void AtcHandler::SetPbAlphaTagRequestBehaviour (  PbRequestBehaviour  behaviour  )  [inline]
 

The method SetPbAlphaTagRequestBehaviour() set the behaviour of answering AT alpha identifier requests

void AtcHandler::SetPbRecordRequestBehaviour (  BOOLEAN  mmicontrolled  )  [inline]
 

The method SetPbRecordRequestBehaviour() has to be called with parameter TRUE if the MMI is capably to answer the phone book requests.
